overview: Sharif is a journalist and writer who is married to Amani and has a young child. His articles in the fight against political corruption led to his arrest for four years in which his young son drowned. He emerges from the prison, lamenting his wife, whose negligence resulted in the death of his only son. Thin letters in the prison without signature and loves and marries.
title: Al Ragol Yohib Maratein
